entry.title: Linearization post-processing (O(n^2) fancy chunking)
entry.summary: The email emphasizes the significance of reorganizing chunks during the linearization process as a method to enhance the efficiency of diagrams. This approach goes beyond merely introducing new partitions and focuses on the rearrangement of existing chunks. The improvement is presented as a crucial step in optimizing linearization, potentially refining any suboptimal steps within the process. The discussion suggests that this strategy could be widely applicable, offering improvements over traditional methods by ensuring that the structure of diagrams is not only maintained but also enhanced for better performance and clarity.
